name: fastnote
description: fastnote: An app leveraging your note experience on desktop. Focus on anytime availability.
author: Iriseplos

scripts.dev:electron: npm run transpile:electron && npm run resource:copy-electron && chcp 65001 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.dist:mac: npm run transpile:electron && npm run resource:copy-electron && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:win: npm run transpile:electron && npm run resource:copy-electron && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: npm run transpile:electron && npm run resource:copy-electron && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --arm64
